title: What laptop brands are manufacturing their own laptops now from scratch? - Quora

response.answer_text: Actually no one can build a laptop from scratch. Each component is manufactured by different companies. Processors are manufactured by Intel or AMD. Motherboards by Asus,MSI,Gigabyte etc..,.Graphics card by Nvidia,Asus,AMD,etc..,. RAM by Corasir,Kingston,HyperX,etc..,. HDD and SSD by Toshiba,Kingston,WD,Seagate...,. Like this all the components are manufactured by different companies.

From scratch if you mean using their own manufactured components in the assembly of laptop, then there might not be any; sadly. No one manufactures all the components by themselves. Even Iphone manufacturer 'Apple' has their iconic 'Retina Display' manufactured by their rival 'Samsung'.
